Package ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.cache

Class ReplacingRecord<V>

java.lang.Object
ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.cache.BaseRecord<Stream<V>,List<V>>
ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.cache.ReplacingRecord<V>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Record<Stream<V>>
public final class ReplacingRecord<V> extends BaseRecord<Stream<V>,List<V>>
Takes a stream of items and stores them. When updated, it discards the existing items and replaces them all
